data.Name: Hobo Johnson
data.Bio: Frank Lopes is a hip hop artist from Sacramento, CA. The Rise of Hobo Johnson was self released May 11, 2016. Hobo Johnson is a young man born in a 94 Toyota Corolla who entered the outside world this fall. Watch him find his way back to his Corolla Frank is actually a peach scone that writes music in his Subaru Crosstrek. Read more on Last.fm
